title: Philip Hammond
summary: Philip Hammond, Baron Hammond of Runnymede PC[1][2][3] (born 4 December 1955)[4] is a British politician and life peer who served as Chancellor of the Exchequer from 2016 to 2019, Foreign Secretary from 2014 to 2016, and Defence Secretary from 2011 to 2014. A member of the Conservative Party, he was the Member of Parliament (MP) for Runnymede and Weybridge from 1997 to 2019.
